personal.name: Youssef Salem Hassan
personal.title: Flutter Developer
personal.shortBio: Flutter Developer with expertise in cross-platform mobile app development, machine learning integration, and modern UI/UX design. Experienced with Dart, Python, TensorFlow, and Firebase.
personal.longBio: I'm a dedicated Flutter developer with a strong background in mobile app development and machine learning. I specialize in creating cross-platform applications that deliver exceptional user experiences across iOS, Android, and web platforms. Currently working as a freelancer on Mostaql.com and continuously expanding my skills through specialized programs.

experience.description: Freelance mobile app developer working on various Flutter projects for clients.
achievements: Developing custom Flutter applications for diverse client needs
Implementing modern UI/UX designs with responsive layouts
Integrating Firebase services for backend functionality
Maintaining high client satisfaction through quality deliverables

experience.description: Intensive Flutter development training program focusing on modern mobile app development.
achievements: Mastered Flutter framework and Dart programming language
Learned advanced state management with BLoC and Riverpod
Built multiple hands-on projects including music player and chat applications
Gained expertise in Firebase integration and API consumption

experience.description: Machine Learning engineering program focusing on practical AI applications.
achievements: Developed expertise in TensorFlow and Python for ML applications
Created multimodal emotion recognition system using audio and video
Learned computer vision techniques and audio processing
Applied ML models in real-world mobile applications
President of Computer Science Student Association
Published research paper on machine learning applications

projects.title: Multi-Emotion Recognition for Customer service
projects.shortDescription: Multimodal ML framework for emotion detection from audio/video.
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive multimodal machine learning framework that analyzes emotions from both audio and video inputs. This advanced system combines computer vision and audio processing techniques to provide accurate emotion recognition for customer service applications.
features: Real-time emotion detection from video feed
Audio emotion analysis from voice patterns
challenges: Combining audio and video modalities effectively
Optimizing ML models for real-time performance
Handling diverse emotional expressions and audio quality

projects.title: Music Player App
projects.description: Built a comprehensive music player application using Flutter with modern UI design and essential music playback features. The app provides a smooth user experience with intuitive controls and playlist management.
challenges: Managing app state during background play
Creating responsive UI for different screen sizes

projects.title: Chat App
projects.shortDescription: Real-time chat with Firebase auth and Firestore.
projects.description: Developed a real-time chat application using Flutter and Firebase services. The app features secure authentication, real-time messaging, and cloud-based message storage with a modern, user-friendly interface.

projects.title: ChargeHub App
projects.shortDescription: EV & gas station finder with maps and BLoC.
projects.description: Created a comprehensive charging station finder application for electric vehicles and gas stations. The app uses Google Maps integration and BLoC pattern for state management, providing users with nearby charging options and navigation features.
challenges: Implementing BLoC pattern for complex state management
Optimizing location services and map performance

achievements.title: Best Mobile App Award
achievements.description: Won first place in the Regional Mobile App Development Competition

achievements.title: Open Source Contributor
achievements.description: Active contributor to Flutter and Dart open source projects with 50+ merged PRs

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Youssef is an exceptional Flutter developer who consistently delivers high-quality applications. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills are outstanding.

testimonials.name: Ahmed Mohamed
testimonials.text: Working with Youssef was a pleasure. He brought innovative solutions to complex problems and his expertise in machine learning integration was invaluable.
